replies.message: Hi Michael. We’re sorry to hear that you didn’t enjoy your Facebook experience. If there is anything that you would change about it please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Chantal
I don't like half the things on here "Chantal" help center doesn't do anything.
FACEBOOK! since when can everyone see your pic even if your pic is HIDDEN!????
Thanks for the feedback, Kathy. We’re sorry to hear that, Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable at our feedback page: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Chantal (the human)

Facebook. I have been trying for months to get the dozens of altered photos using my image removed from the Facebook page "The Thin Blue Line" (facebook.com/pages/The-Thin-Blue-Line/1503187509940058) without any progress. I've been told the photos are a violation of your TOS, so what do I need to do to get the photos removed.

Below are links to each photo that mocks my likeness without my permission.
